mapper.select: SELECT link.id as linkId,link.link_image,link.link_name,link.link_order,link.link_type,type.type_name, type.type_order ,type.id as typeId,link.link_url from t_link link LEFT JOIN t_link_type type on type.id = link.link_type where link.state = '1' and type.state = '1' order by type.type_order asc
